title: Driver Error

query: The NVIDIA driver on your system is too old
title: Outdated driver
message: The NVIDIA driver installed on your system is too old! Please install the latest drivers. If you are already using the latest it is very possible that your GPU is not compatible and you need to change the processing device option to CPU.
